name: Dummy Run
description:
You are in a world where an unknown entity has abducted you to be a test dummy. You were selected for a reason unrevealed to you and are forced to test and complete multiple different obstacle levels to be allowed to return home and back to your life. This is a challenging first-person platformer speedrunning game where timing each jump is crucial. 

Controls

'WASD' - move around

shift - hold to sprint

spacebar - press to jump

escape - press to bring up the pause menu

'R' - while in a level, press to restart the entire run
